title: cintaik-kanavil
sahitya:
cintaik-kanavil vanda nAyakA ciranjIviyAna sukhadAyakA


anupallavi

  antaranga manat-tantiyilE shubhapantuvarALi pAindu varum pOdu


caraNam    muttu muttAga nakSattiram pUttu mullai muruvalai aLLi vIsum vELai
eddishaiyilum iyarkkai azhagin inbamAna kalaip-paNbu pongum vELai
